item.title: 台风 "凤王 "逼近，菲律宾做好准备
item.description: 菲律宾救灾机构和地方政府部门已开始为台风 "凤王 "的到来做准备，先期从脆弱地区疏散居民，并储存设备和救灾物资。【原文：Philippine disaster agencies and local government units started preparing for the arrival of Typhoon Fung-Wong, with the pre-emptive evacuation of residents from vulnerable areas and the storing of equipment and relief supplies.】

item.title: 辉瑞在与诺和诺德的竞购战中提高了对美塞拉的报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，辉瑞公司已向肥胖症药物初创公司 Metsera Inc. 提交了一份更加诱人的收购要约，因为该公司与竞争对手诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的争斗正在继续升级。【原文：Pfizer Inc. has submitted a sweetened bid for obesity drug startup Metsera Inc. as its fight against rival Novo Nordisk A/S continues to escalate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法官宣布麻省理工学院毕业生兄弟诈骗案无效
item.description: 纽约的一名法官周五宣布对两兄弟欺诈案的审判无效，这两兄弟都刚从麻省理工学院毕业，他们被指控从以太坊区块链上的交易商那里窃取了大约 2500 万美元的加密货币。【原文：A judge in New York on Friday declared a mistrial in the fraud case against two brothers, both recently graduated from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, who were accused of stealing roughly $25 million in cryptocurrency from traders on the Ethereum blockchain.】

item.title: HF Sinclair 和 Phillips 66 赢得环保局生物燃料贷款豁免权
item.description: 周五，HF Sinclair Corp. 和 Phillips 66 Co. 旗下的炼油厂赢得了特朗普政府对生物燃料掺混规定的豁免，而雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）的请求则遭到拒绝。【原文：Refineries owned by HF Sinclair Corp. and Phillips 66 Co. won exemptions from biofuel blending mandates from the Trump administration Friday, while requests by Chevron Corp. were denied.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长震荡引发投资者末日论战
item.description: 菲律宾经济增长急剧下滑，暴露了大规模贪污腐败的曝光如何打击了人们的信心，尽管高官们坚称国家仍在正常运转。【原文：The Philippines’ sharp growth slump lays bare how revelations of massive graft have gutted confidence, even as top officials insist the nation is still on track.】

item.title: 美联储称与金融杠杆有关的漏洞 "值得注意
item.description: 美联储在一份关于金融稳定性的半年度报告中指出了与杠杆有关的脆弱性，称银行系统仍然 "稳健而富有弹性"。【原文：The Federal Reserve flagged vulnerabilities tied to leverage in a semi-annual report on financial stability that said the banking system remained “sound and resilient.”】

item.title: 人工智能和加密货币押注存疑，华尔街 "刺激之旅 "出轨
item.description: 本周股市没有崩盘。但在经历了长达七个月的散户投机之后，部分赌场开始清场。【原文：The stock market didn’t crash this week. But after a seven-month spasm of retail-borne speculation, parts of the casino started clearing out.】

item.title: Engie 董事长称，尽管美国出台了政策，但人工智能需求仍推动太阳能发展
item.description: Engie SA 董事长让-皮埃尔-克拉马迪厄（Jean-Pierre Clamadieu）周五表示，尽管与人工智能相关的电力需求激增将继续支持风能和太阳能发电场，但政策的不确定性正在阻碍对美国能源项目的投资。【原文：Policy uncertainty is deterring investment in US energy projects, though surging power demand tied to artificial intelligence will continue to support wind and solar farms, Engie SA Chairman Jean-Pierre Clamadieu said Friday.】

item.title: 加沙停火后，S&P 将以色列评级展望改为稳定
item.description: S&P 全球评级公司将以色列的评级展望从负面调整为稳定，这是在以色列与哈马斯开始停火约一个月之后，因为加沙战争导致以色列经济紧张。【原文：S&P Global Ratings revised Israel’s outlook to stable from negative, around a month after the country began a ceasefire with Hamas following a war in Gaza that’s strained its economy.】

item.title: 赌场运营商爱芬尼寻求 Moelis 就债务谈判提供建议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，赌场运营商 Affinity Interactive 正在与 Moelis & Co.【原文：Casino operator Affinity Interactive is in talks with Moelis & Co. for advice as it looks to negotiate with bondholders over a potential restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 呼吁美国将芯片法案税收优惠扩大到人工智能数据中心
item.description: OpenAI 已要求特朗普政府修改《芯片法案》（Chips Act）税收减免政策，以帮助降低人工智能基础设施的成本。【原文：OpenAI has asked the Trump administration to revamp a Chips Act tax credit to help lower the cost of artificial intelligence infrastructure, as the startup explores additional ways the US government can support an industrywide data center build-out for AI.】

item.title: 华尔街在购物旺季敲响削减 SNAP 的警钟
item.description: 随着美国政府停摆进一步延续到 11 月，并威胁到假日消费，预算僵局的一个牺牲品恐怕会打击大型食品杂货商及其供应商的销售：每月联邦食品援助的延迟。【原文：As the US government shutdown stretches further into November and threatens holiday spending, one casualty of the budget impasse feared to hit sales of major grocers and their suppliers: the delay of monthly federal food assistance.】

item.title: 创建 DIY 基金只需 30 万美元和一个梦想
item.description: 虽然成本下降意味着推出 ETF 比以往任何时候都更容易，但吸引资产的门槛也提高了。【原文：While declining costs have meant it’s easier than ever to launch an ETF, the bar for attracting assets has been raised as well.】

item.title: OpenAI 高管努力消除对人工智能支出的担忧
item.description: OpenAI 和其他科技公司的几位高管本周试图消除人们对人工智能支出日益增长的焦虑。但首先...【原文：Several executives from OpenAI and other tech firms tried to dispel growing anxiety this week about AI spending. But first…】

item.title: 在 OpenAI 引起的轩然大波中，特朗普政府排除了人工智能后备力量
item.description: 美国官员表示，特朗普政府官员正在否定为人工智能公司提供财政支持的想法，此前，OpenAI 公司一位高层管理人员的言论引发了人们对联邦救助前景的质疑。【原文：Trump administration officials are dismissing the idea of a financial backstop for artificial intelligence companies, US officials said, after comments from a top OpenAI executive raised questions about the prospects for a federal bailout.】

item.title: 美国消费者非循环债务借贷增加
item.description: 在非循环借贷创下今年最大增幅的推动下，9 月份美国消费信贷出现增长。【原文：US consumer credit increased in September, driven by the largest advance in non-revolving borrowing this year.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰称稳定币将给利率带来下行压力
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，随着时间的推移，稳定币的增长可能会给中性利率带来巨大的下行压力，这既不会刺激经济，也不会限制经济。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said the growth of stablecoins could over time put substantial downward pressure on the neutral interest rate that would neither stimulate nor restrict the economy.】

item.title: 政府关门加剧融资市场混乱
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 侠盗猎车手 6》延期未能吓倒 Take-Two 股票分析师
item.description: 玩家们对期待已久的《侠盗猎车手 6》（Grand Theft Auto VI）的最新延期反应强烈，但股票分析师们并不气馁，绝大多数分析师都建议投资者继续关注 Take-Two Interactive Software Inc.【原文：Gamers took the latest delay to the long-awaited Grand Theft Auto VI hard, but stock analysts are undaunted, with the vast majority recommending investors stick with Take-Two Interactive Software Inc.】

item.title: 银行为新墨西哥州甲骨文数据中心贷款 180 亿美元
item.description: 由约 20 家银行组成的集团将提供约 180 亿美元的项目融资贷款，帮助为甲骨文公司数据中心园区的建设提供资金，这标志着为人工智能热潮提供资金支持的最新大型债务交易。【原文：A group of about 20 banks is providing a roughly $18 billion project finance loan to help fund the construction of a data center campus tied to Oracle Corp., marking the latest mega debt deal to help bankroll the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 中国贸易协议的 "模糊性 "让美国拖拉机制造商陷入困境
item.description: 目前还不清楚接下来的几个月是否会成为陷入困境的农机行业的转折点，中美贸易协议的细节极少，让制造商们不知道种植者何时会重新开始消费。【原文：It’s unclear if the next new months will mark a turning point for the struggling farm-machinery sector, with minimal details on the US-China trade deal keeping manufacturers wondering when growers will start spending again.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数牛市迎接停摆带来的更多痛苦
item.description: 最新的《市场脉搏》调查显示，如果政府关门再持续一周或更长的时间，本已摇摇欲坠的美国股市将遭遇更严重的损失。【原文：The already-faltering US stock market is set for deeper losses should the government shutdown last another week or longer, the latest Markets Pulse survey showed.】

item.title: 2025 年债券销售额突破 5000 亿美元，债券市场创下纪录
item.description: 美国各州和地方政府在 2025 年连续第二年出售了创纪录的债务，在市政市场上借贷了 5000 多亿美元，部分原因是它们要解决挥之不去的基础设施需求。【原文：US states and local governments have sold a record amount of debt for the second year in a row, borrowing over $500 billion in the municipal market in 2025, in part as they tackle lingering infrastructure needs.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚在遭到反弹后搁置数字支付税收计划
item.description: 在行业团体和企业的强烈反对下，哥伦比亚财政部正在搁置对数字支付征收预扣税的提案。【原文：Colombia’s finance ministry is shelving a proposal to impose a withholding tax on digital payments, following a backlash from industry groups and businesses.】

item.title: 前路愈加迷茫，CarMax 分析师抛出橄榄枝
item.description: 由于二手车零售商面临长期挑战和不确定性，CarMax 公司灾难性的季度数据促使至少五家华尔街公司降低了对该公司股票的评级。【原文：CarMax Inc.’s disastrous quarterly numbers prompted at least five Wall Street firms to lower their ratings on the stock as the used-car retailer faces long-term challenges and uncertainties.】

item.title: Onex 首席执行官认为 AIG 获胜后有可能达成更多保险交易
item.description: Onex Corp.公司高层表示，继与美国国际集团（American International Group Inc.【原文：Onex Corp.’s top executive says the alternative asset manager is open to making further large bets on insurance companies following its move to team up with American International Group Inc. on a major deal.】

item.title: 就业数据相互矛盾，美联储前景扑朔迷离，美国国债走势受阻
item.description: 本周，由于有关美国劳动力市场健康状况的私营部门数据相互矛盾，导致美联储 12 月再次降息的预期悬而未决，国债市场的牛市和熊市打了个平手。【原文：Treasury market bulls and bears fought to a draw this week as conflicting private-sector data on the health of the US labor market left expectations for another Federal Reserve interest-rate cut in December in limbo.】

item.title: 球X坑》如何成为一款热门视频游戏
item.description: 这款独立游戏自 10 月 15 日发布以来已售出 75 万份。【原文：The indie title has sold 750,000 copies since its release on Oct. 15.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司顶级油田将于 12 月启动下一个平台
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司今年将继续扩大世界最大油田的产量，同时在推进深水项目时避免成本上涨。【原文：Petrobras will continue expanding production at the world’s biggest oil field this year while avoiding cost inflation as it advances deep-water projects.】

item.title: Blackstone 通过豪华酒店交易押注旧金山卷土重来
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 即将达成收购旧金山四季酒店的交易，押注旧金山的经济反弹将提振当地的住宿市场。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to acquire the Four Seasons Hotel San Francisco, a bet that the city’s economic rebound will lift the local lodging market.】
